magpie.data.utilities.filters

Class EntryRankerFilter

  • java.lang.Object
    • magpie.data.utilities.filters.BaseDatasetFilter
      • magpie.data.utilities.filters.EntryRankerFilter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, Options

    public class EntryRankerFilter
extends BaseDatasetFilter
    Filter entries based on ranking. Lets the user pick the number of entries to keep, whether to select the best or lest fit, use the predicted or measured class, and then the overall method and its options. Consequently, the "Usage" is pretty messy.

    Usage: <number> <maximum|minimum> <predicted|measured> <method> [<options...>]
    number: Number of entries that pass this filter
    maximum|minimum: Whether entries with a max/minimum value pass the filter
    method: Objective function used to rank entries. Name of an BaseEntryRanker ("?" for available methods)
    options...: Any options for the objective function

    See Also:
    Serialized Form
